line.text: How like a winter hath my absence been
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From thee the pleasure of the fleeting year
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: What freezings have I felt what dark days seen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And yet this time removed was summer time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The teeming autumn big with rich increase
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Bearing the wanton burden of the prime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Like widowed wombs after their lords decease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet this abundant issue seemed to me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But hope of orphans and unfathered fruit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For summer and his pleasures wait on thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thou away the very birds are mute
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or if they sing tis with so dull a cheer
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That leaves look pale dreading the winter near
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
